scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts Saint John the Baptist, identifiable by his halo and characteristic attire of animal skins, pointing towards a lamb resting on an open book. He wears a rough, brown tunic and a rich crimson cloak draped over his shoulders. The lamb, a symbol of Christ, is white and appears docile. The background is a lush, green forest with trees and foliage, suggesting an outdoor setting. The image is framed by a decorative gold border, and a gilded initial 'I' is visible in the upper right corner.
